title: Sampler, 1723–24
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, eyelet, and shaded satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Alphabets, numerals, "Agnes Hodge, February the 5 1723-4 in the 9th year of my age" and the Lord's Prayer surrounded by a floral frame.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1723–24.
1723–24. Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, eyelet, and shaded satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-88.
